name: Mycovania
description:
Controls:
  • Move: WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump: SPACEBAR
  • Attack: J
  • Interact: K
  • Pause: ESC
Description:

Arthropods have kicked the mushroomfolk out of their tree castle. You are the chosen one who can gain abilities from other mushroomfolk. Explore the world and become stronger to eventually defeat the usurper and reclaim the castle.

This game was created for the SodorJam - Spring 2023 with the theme of "Castlevania"

This is a prototype version only implementing content up to (and including) the first boss. It might receive updates in the future.

Credits:

Pixelart / Programming: Zoggga ( Twitter | Twitch )

Musik / SFX:  All music and sound effects used are public domain (CC0-Licence)

The music specifically was done by Ansimuz
